body_html:
But for example Keras is very popular and having such higher level interface would not be useless. Of course when I'm building some sophisticated model I describe the data flow by myself. But people often run commonly used and well studied architectural patterns. For these needs writing a one liner instead of designing a class can be better.
Probably it worths to add a separate MultiRNN? However I agree that it won't be so trivial as Sequential
